sentence.Network_en: Kenny, struggling with too many chairs, moved crabwise towards the door.
sentence.Network_cn: 肯尼在许多椅子中间艰难穿行，像螃蟹一样横着向门口挪去。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Lk的意思中文翻译 ... crabsidle (蟹似地)横爬, 横行 crabwise 横斜地, 小心地 crabwood 野苹果木.
英语常用的词根词缀_百度知道 ... clockwise（ 顺时针方向的）, crabwise（ 横斜的）, 。 weatherwise（ 就天气而言）.
AGV_百度百科 ... 后退 Backward 侧移（crabwise） Crabwise 转弯 Turnning.
crabbingcrabwise 横行crab apple 沙果花红树海棠树

auth_sentence.content: These numerous facts, conveyed in crabwise stops and starts, are mixed or minced in with a fictional family drama.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表副词,"方向,状态",也可表形容词
